::Astral/Fenox/Starlight/Recklessa::

Astral growls, firing two dozen more shots at Prebon. "Yes, and your 
troops fell rather quickly."

He believed his troops were doing fine. The trainers were good, yes, 
but his had only been warming up of course (or were they?).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox speeds up toward the falling bot, feeling Prebon's shots hit 
her in the legs. She caught the new bot, flying off toward the Iron 
Fist.

"Ha, try to catch me now!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight dodged the missile, firing three charges at Prebon as she 
flew toward him. Out of the corner of her eyes, she saw Recklessa 
climb out from the sea.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Prebon launches two missles the first intercepts Starlights charge 
> and the second continues toward Starlight. Prebon speeds up his 
> flight and flies in the direction of the falling bot. on the way he 
> fires three more shots at Fenox. 
> 
> In an attempt at witty banter with Astral he keeps his comm 
> open. "Troops are only as good as the bot in charge." He can't help 
> to think how poorly these Alliance bots have performed in the 
battle. 
> if it wasn't for the main gun the Trainers would probably be 
sitting 
> in the command chair. "So far with what I know about your leader I 
> fail to be surprised that you can't win."
